title: Modern City Apartment
description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior...

title: Beachfront House
description:
Recently renovated, Satin Doll has evolved into a stunning luxury House.
The new entrant into the luxury scene comfortably resides amongst the   best that Brighton has to offer.Entered via a long covered walk way that ensures the only audible sound is the ocean you enter the house from the walled-in and manicured gardens. There are 4 bedroom suites and 1 family room with a king size bed and adjoining room with bunk beds. All rooms are air con with four poster beds, comfortable chairs and covered private terraces that face the garden and ocean. The entertainment area, with a home cinema Sat TV, DVD and WiFi,  is on a mezzanine floor overlooking the open plan sitting / dining area. Several seating areas allow for some private reading and the gardens are large enough to siesta in peace after a midday feast. There is raised beach side seating as well as a beach side pavilion and direct beach access. A full compliment of staff, including great cook, are on hand to ensure you will be well looked afterâ€¦and fed. Breakfast is included and there is a set price for lunch and dinner.

title: John Walkers Flat
description: Stunning two-bedroom Flat located in the heart of the city, boasting contemporary design and luxurious amenities. Close proximity to major business districts and excellent transport links. The apartment features an open-plan living space, high-end kitchen, en-suite bathrooms, and panoramic city views.

title: Countryside Home
description: Exquisite countryside villa offering tranquility and scenic views. This five-bedroom property features sprawling gardens, a private pool, and spacious interiors. Located in a serene countryside setting, it provides a perfect escape while being easily accessible to nearby towns and amenities.
